sailpoint.object

Class ScoreConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.SailPointObject
        • sailpoint.object.ScoreConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject, sailpoint.tools.xml.XMLReferenceTarget

    public class ScoreConfig
extends SailPointObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A class holding global configurations for scoring. There is only one of these, referenced through a constant name.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRightConfig

        public RightConfig getRightConfig()
        Optional reference to a RightConfig object to be used by the scorers within this score configuration. This is used only by the unit tests, though it could also be useful for what-if analysis. If this is null, the scorers should default to using the global RightConfig object.
